mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, HEIGHT, CURRENT_WEIGHT, MAIN_GOAL, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, BIRTHDATE, AGE, GENDER, BMI ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{height}, #{currentWeight}, #{mainGoal}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{birthdate}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{bmi} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, HEIGHT, CURRENT_WEIGHT, MAIN_GOAL, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, DATE_FORMAT(BIRTHDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTHDATE, AGE, GENDER, CREATED_AT, BMI FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
